graph.partitioning
Class SPPMaker4HG

java.lang.Object
  graph.partitioning.SPPMaker4HG
All Implemented Interfaces:
SPPMakerIntf
public class SPPMaker4HG
extends java.lang.Object
implements SPPMakerIntf

creates SPPMakerIntf objects that set-up the A matrix and c cost vector in a set partitioning problem (SPP) of n variables of the form min c'x such that Ax=e, x Binary.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

Company:

1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou
